prat.p: Shelf-stable, dry canine nutriments (dry dog food or crunchies) must be made available at regular intervals in an accessible location, in a bowl. More or less any dry food is acceptable especially if odoriferous.

part.name: statement
part.p: Delicious tasty morsels of canned dog food can be provided in popular flavors including beef, kidney and liver.

part.name: statement
part.p: Basically anything that human companions have enjoyed can be offered as table scraps. Care should be taken, however, when administering alcoholic beverages to dogs.

part.name: statement
part.p: Kitchen drawers and doors should be kept closed to prevent incursion by inquisitive or hungry animals.
